item.title: Z_WaveRelative
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. Introduce a wireless home automation protocol; an alliance of companies; all z-ware hardware uses sigma chips; z-wave has been a closed protocol; devices and protocol managed by sigma and z-wave alliance; certified devices undergo a certification scheme to ensure compatibility; open source projects needed to rely on reverse engineering the protocol; approx 600 companies and 2200 certified devices; introduce in 2015 and backward compatible with the original standard; improved devices with lower battery comsumption, coupled with improved protocol functionality; data rate 100kb/s; lower power consumption for better battery life; 2.
